author: Aj C
title: Highly recommend due to price, location, service, cleanliness - Review
text: I have stayed at this establishment about 3-4 times over the past year. My most recent stay was a lengthy one while looking for a place to live in NYC. I always enjoyed my visits and have absolutely no complaints, location & room rates are excellent with nice clean rooms and great friendly and helpful staff. Lucas the manager was always extremely nice and accommodating, setting a really good example to fellow employees. Rosalyn on the 11th floor was always very friendly and hopeful. Thanks so much, AJ
